name: 2.Thee—Oscillation
description:
𝙢𝙚𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙧𝙚𝙙𝙪𝙘𝙚𝙙 𝙩𝙤 𝙖𝙣 𝙤𝙨𝙘𝙞𝙡𝙡𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣,
𝙖𝙣 𝙞𝙣𝙫𝙞𝙨𝙞𝙗𝙡𝙚 𝙬𝙤𝙧𝙡𝙙 𝙧𝙚𝙫𝙚𝙖𝙡𝙚𝙙
𝙢𝙪𝙡𝙩𝙞𝙥𝙡𝙚 𝙬𝙤𝙧𝙡𝙙𝙨 𝙘𝙤𝙝𝙖𝙗𝙞𝙩𝙞𝙣𝙜
𝙧𝙚𝙤𝙧𝙜𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙯𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙩𝙝𝙚𝙞𝙧 𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙜𝙧𝙖𝙢 𝙜𝙪𝙞𝙙𝙚𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙚𝙨
...

11/08/2021
6:06PM
It’s been a few days since “MGK-TV” suddenly appeared to us, vividly sparkling and sizzling as a being trying to demonstrate its eerie language to whoever bumped into it. The dysfunctional apparatus caught our attention by resonating some puzzling words/sounds unpredictably times a day. It seems to consider our human language system and culture, although we think its interference could point out other way of communicating. Whatever it’s trying to say/show – if it’s trying to say/show something – is vibrating increasingly intense each time we experience it; its electrostatic resonates sharply in our bodies, crawling our skin, rubbing our bones, our minds. It seems something is on the verge of collide.
Oh… our eyes... they feel like awakening...
